Name: Dark Room VR
About the game: Listen to the demons coming at you from every direction, for if you don't, bad things will happen. Dark Room VR will test your aiming precision, your ability to hear the faintest sounds, and your will to stay in this horrendous room of terrors. Kill the demons before they enter your body and possess your soul or suffer in the depths of hell where they welcome you with open arms.
